DOC.brief_title: Evaluation New Radiotracer ( 64Cu-DOTA-AE105 ) Diagnosing Aggressive Cancer With Positron Emission Tomography

The tracer potential identifying invasive cancer phenotype , thereby distinguish aggressive less aggressive tumor . This first human study test radiotracer cancer patient .
